website_summaries.verdict: Those wanting a larger spoon rest with a rustic French design will appreciate this stylish, stone-fired product.
pros: Available in a variety of colors
Resistant to stains, chipping, odors, and cracking
cons: Lightweight design led a few customers to believe that the product will easily break if dropped

customer_reviews.title: Broken.
customer_reviews.text: My spoon rest was shipped in a bag. Naturally, it arrived in 3 large pieces and 3 small ones. Who puts a stoneware piece in a bag???!! Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a Real Spoon Rest
customer_reviews.text: Now I can put almost any sized spoon on a rest and not feel as if it will fall off. Add to that the ease of which it can be washed and reused in a snippet. The bottom is smooth, but could be a tad better (I solve that issued with 400 grit sandpaper), enough to sit on the stove and not have any scratch issues confounding it. Even though it is dishwasher safe a simple soak in the sink does the job and it is off to the stove. Without equivocation, I recommend this rest and will buy another one when or if this breaks.
customer_reviews.author: John Schëar

customer_reviews.title: Large spoon rest.
customer_reviews.text: It’s really large! Bigger than I thought which isn’t a bad thing but I won’t be having it out in the counter all the time due to this.
customer_reviews.author: M, Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: It’s lighter weight than I expected and seems like it will chip easily. That said, I’m being careful and it hasn’t chipped yet.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice on my counter and works well to keep my counter clean. Rinses easily.
customer_reviews.author: B. Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have if you like a tidy stovetop! Bought this as a gift and hopefully it will be well received! It’s well made and a beautiful color! Thx!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Feldhues

customer_reviews.title: Received two spoon rests!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic spoon rest! I thought the price was a little high but I really wanted this spoon rest, so I bought it. Surprisingly, this price is for a set of TWO! Nowhere in the ad does it state that it is a package of two, but that made the price a little easier to accept. Now I have spoon rests both beside the stove and on the other side of the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Cessna Lady

customer_reviews.title: It's really big1
customer_reviews.text: It's about twice as big as other spoon rests. I'd considered returning it at first, but didn't want to deal with that. I've now gotten used to it and the size does have a plus -- you can can put 2 spoons on it at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Hamblin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality spoon rest
customer_reviews.text: Great high quality spoon rest, matches my utensil holder. Does great in the dish washer on top rack.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Norman

customer_reviews.title: color is different than expected
customer_reviews.text: Please be aware that the the Marseilles coloris much brighter than in the picture in person. It looks like a dark teal in the picture and when it arrived it is much more like I a carribbean blue color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like this spoon rest
customer_reviews.text: I really like this spoon rest, but I'm worried it will break since it has no padding on the bottom. Since many people have countertops made of granite, quartz, tile, etc.... you have to be careful setting it down on the counter otherwise it could break.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Not a true white
customer_reviews.text: If you have other white Le Crueset items this will not match. It looks almost gray next to my other pieces. Not pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Laney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks good on counter. Works as expected. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Alex E Siedlecki

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Crap
customer_reviews.text: Le creuset has gone downhill. This is cheap garbage trying to cash in on past quality. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Magaline

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: Great look and quality! The first delivery was chipped in the packaging, but it was quickly replaced. Highly recommend for those who cook frequently but want a refined display
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Matchy matchy
customer_reviews.text: It looks great next to my matching le creuset products. It does feel lighter than expected, I hope it’s durable, we will see!
customer_reviews.author: Seattlemom

customer_reviews.title: Had flaws...
customer_reviews.text: This had a flaw, exchanged it and the new one had a flaw, so... moving on to something different : (
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany N.

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: For realistic for cooking purposes WAY TOO SMALL HAD TO RETURN
customer_reviews.author: S Ro

customer_reviews.title: White Le Creuset spoon rest
customer_reviews.text: Good price for a Le Creuset spoon rest. Bought 2. They are easy to clean and dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: this thing is awesome!

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This is a waste of $30. If you are not careful this item will chip or break instantly. I honestly do not think this is a real Le Creuset piece.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Bertoli

customer_reviews.title: Quality great as always
customer_reviews.text: Quality great as always. I didnt like the design. Went with an older design that doesn't include the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Mama H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great spoon rest, solid. Little pricey but you're paying for the name and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Gierth

customer_reviews.title: Holds dirty spoons like any other dirty spoon holder
customer_reviews.text: Works well, hasn't cracked when it gets bumped onto a burner so that is good. Washes up well in the dishwasher, and best of all it doesn't get upset when you put a dirty spoon on it. who woulda thunk??
customer_reviews.author: Springer Spaniel Dad

customer_reviews.title: Le Creuset is awesome. They are expensive but you get everything you ...
customer_reviews.text: Le Creuset is awesome. They are expensive but you get everything you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Di

customer_reviews.title: spoon rest
customer_reviews.text: I love anything from Le Crueset and this is no exception. I do wish, however, that I would have ordered the smaller one. I am not returning it because I love it!
customer_reviews.author: jlh

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to my set
customer_reviews.text: Goes well with other pieces of my collection. Cost not too crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Eamon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Works and looks great, color matches perfectly to all my other Le Creuset!
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Quality Low for the Price
customer_reviews.text: The quality does not seem to match the other Le Creuset Stoneware. It is thin and does not lie flat. Seems like a cheap piece riding on the Le Creuset name.
customer_reviews.author: H. Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the sugar and cream set, utensil crock and this spoon rest - all in the "flame" color, and they look great together. High quality. This spoon is a a good size for keeping cooking tools
customer_reviews.author: Sidhant

customer_reviews.title: Le Creuset
customer_reviews.text: I really like all Le Creuset products. The colors are great. I like the blues most. Cook great and are very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: 1tdybear

customer_reviews.title: So happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for this gorgeous color for months. It is the perfect piece to compliment my marble kitchen counters. Love how easy it is to clean and such a convenient size.
customer_reviews.author: rararachel

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Nice quality. Large enough for a ladle but not oversized. Easy to clean. I have several pieces (butter dish, salt & pepper shaker, utensil holder) and they give my counter a clean updated look.
customer_reviews.author: betty

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The color was different in the picture than in person
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: I returned this product.  Wrong color.
customer_reviews.text: Le Creuset's products are expensive, and when I received it, the blue color is kind of washed out. I wanted a strong cobalt blue.
customer_reviews.author: Esther K. Torrens

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but delicate
customer_reviews.text: I love this product because it goes great with the rest of my white LeCreuset pieces. The only thing I'd say is a watch-out is that the spoon rest seems delicate, not as thick as some of the other pieces. Mine hasn't broken or chipped, I am just careful when hand washing it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Warner

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Waste Your Money!!!
customer_reviews.text: I read previous reviews stating that people received this same item broken. I thought it wouldn’t happen to me. I was wrong. This item didn’t have a chance. Was completely shattered upon arrival.
customer_reviews.author: F_Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great, slightly fragile
customer_reviews.text: The trivet matches the other items from same collection. Works well and cleans easily. Just be careful washing and handling as it can be a bit fragile.
customer_reviews.author: zeroorone

customer_reviews.title: nice addition to kitchen counter
customer_reviews.text: Good spoon rest, wide surface . Easy to clean, rinse or dishwasher safe. Only drawback would be breakage, I had a red one for several years. Finally broke but served its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret L. Niccum

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It's very pretty and sits by my stove. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Q

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and pretty; received one
customer_reviews.text: It is lightweight, but I don't find that to be a problem. I'm a little confused that so many people said they received two... I only received one. Other than that slight disappointment, I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Maribeth Becker

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality, That’s Le Creuset!
customer_reviews.text: Matches the rest of my Le Creuset collection and is practical and durable. Classic design.
customer_reviews.author: Madameditor

customer_reviews.title: Set piece.  Fragile.
customer_reviews.text: Light-weight... almost brittle. It hasn't yet, but I'm nervous to wash it or use utensils on it because I paid too much money for it just to crack or chip... I'd expect better construction than this.
customer_reviews.author: R Stack

customer_reviews.title: Love the Marseilles color
customer_reviews.text: Love the Marseilles color. Have a few Le Creuset pieces in this color. This is a nice spoon rest. All ceramic so no rust. Will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: CBSNgal

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly awesome spoon rest!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to go along with my new Le Creuset cookware because I didn't have a spoon rest that could go in the dishwasher. This one is big enough for 2-3 utensils (placed sideways) and is EASY to clean off and works beautiful in the dishwasher (it is dishwasher safe). Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: HTrimmRN

customer_reviews.title: ... quiet as thick as I expected but still a nice spoon rest
customer_reviews.text: Its not quiet as thick as I expected but still a nice spoon rest. I'm a sucker for Le Creuset, maybe because of my love of Julia Child or probably because they have lots in orange. Judge me either way, I am good with it
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in one piece, looking like a Marseilles dream.
customer_reviews.text: Goodness gracious me! This spoon rest successful holds my spoons, ladels, spatuals,whisks, and whatever other kitchen trinket I needs as I embark on my culinary capers in the kitchen! One at a time of course.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: The perfect spoon rest
customer_reviews.text: It is low enough for spoons to stay put and the color blend well with kitchen. I agree with the other reviewer it makes the countertops look clean instead of all chopped up with color that eventually looks like junk.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Looks so beautiful in our kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Looks so beautiful in our kitchen. A spice jar fell from the cabinet above and hit this spoon rest and no damage incurred. A wonderfully crafted piece that is equal parts functional and art!
customer_reviews.author: Hotdog

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: Perfect quality and beauty!! Love this purchase but I don’t think you can go wrong with Le Creuset!!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: It's a sturdy spoon rest
customer_reviews.text: It does its job effectively, especially since it's broad enough to catch "off to the side" spills. It's very easy to clean, and heavy enough to stay put during use.
customer_reviews.author: RBM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match for our Le Creuset set
customer_reviews.text: This is a stoneware piece, so don't expect the cast iron like the cookware. Our first one arrive shattered but thanks to Amazon it was replaced without incident. This spoon rest has a very large surface area and works great on the kitchen stove. Cleans easily too.
customer_reviews.author: Chadwick

customer_reviews.title: Help keeps my stovetop clean while adding a pop of color.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. I got the same color as my Le Creuset Dutch Oven. Works great when I'm cooking and need to rest my spoon. It's big enough for a large spoon and when I'm done, I just put in dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine33

customer_reviews.title: Color is misleading from the photo
customer_reviews.text: The photo is a bit misleading regarding the color. I thought it would have a dark to light fade like so many other le creuset items, but its all grey. The product is still LC excellent quality however.
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Le Creuset Accessory
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the stovetop or counter. Not too heavy. Works with large spoons, ladles, wooden spoons and wipes clean. Comes in lots of colors - this one is a darker blue at the base.
customer_reviews.author: Meg Mitcham

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a small gift for my wife! She loves it and uses it daily when cooking. It arrived very quickly (Amazon Prime) and gets put to good use! Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: P. Levis

customer_reviews.title: It's good
customer_reviews.text: i mean compare to the pots and pans, it's ok, but the pots & pans are awesome. good color match. The only minor, minor slight negative is that it's just a little light weight. Again that's compared to the cookware.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Too light
customer_reviews.text: The spoon rest is good looking and basically functional but it feels a little lighter than you expect. If it had more weight it would be a 5 star item.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J.

customer_reviews.title: I really love the price
customer_reviews.text: I really love the price . Its been two that I bought and Its so classy. Thank you hope to get a good special soon.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie Boudreault

customer_reviews.title: This looks great, and mostly works well
customer_reviews.text: This looks great, and mostly works well, but I do wish it was a bit bigger. Sometimes larger spoons fall off.
customer_reviews.author: John Kraemer

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line
customer_reviews.text: Generous size and it's flat so spoons don't roll off. Le Creuset is an excellent brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little accessory
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little accessory, but the more colorful ones probably give more of an impact (if that's what you're looking for).
customer_reviews.author: Michael T

customer_reviews.title: Great go-to spoon rest
customer_reviews.text: Love this. The marseille blue contrasts beautifully on my black-and-white cooktop. Also does the job of keeping the greasy spoon mess off the stove!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Mills

customer_reviews.title: Nice Compliment
customer_reviews.text: This looks good on my stovetop, combined with my other Le Creuset Marseille pieces. Sturdy and well made. Does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Keeping the stove clean!
customer_reviews.text: great as expected. goes perfect with our (slowly) building collection of Le Creuset! one day we'll have an entire set!
customer_reviews.author: P. L. D. Re

customer_reviews.title: 2 thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. No disappointment here. I put it in the dishwasher all the time and it still looks great.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a spoon shaped spoon holder. You can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: mikeytusa

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these and received them today. They are a nice size and will hold large utensils. However, they were both damaged. One of them had a large dent in the "spoon" part and the other one had a crack running down the "spoon" part. I am disappointed and returning these items.
customer_reviews.author: FiestaLover

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised, I am just not finding it that useful.
customer_reviews.author: Carl M.

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Spoon Rest Functionality-Wise
customer_reviews.text: Works very well because it's wide enough so that ladles and other larger utensils don't roll off. We tried a couple others that were narrower and all had that issue. Since this Le Creuset is wider it also lays flat and stays put. My only gripe is that it's a bit expensive for a spoon holder. But it does what we want, so lack of aggravation is worth the price, lol.
customer_reviews.author: PDTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight. Mine was chipped and I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: P. J.

customer_reviews.title: Don't like it.
customer_reviews.text: Just not fond of this spoon rest. My spoons keep flipping off of it if I don't place them directly in the long part of the rest. I ended up buying a cheap one from Crate and Barrel that is just a white round melamine spoon rest and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: AL

product_meta.title: Le Creuset Stoneware Spoon Rest, 10-Inch, Marseille
product_meta.description: Size:10"| Color:MarseilleKeep surfaces clean with help from this stoneware spoon rest from Le Creuset. The unit's 10-inch design provides ample space for resting spoons, spatulas, and ladles either on the countertop during cooking or at the table when serving. The unit comes in the shape of a spoon, with space for the head and the handle. It also sports the Le Creuset name in raised letters and Le Creuset's signature concentric rings for an added touch of charm. Le Creuset's line of stoneware comes with a hard-wearing, impermeable finish fired at temperatures as high as 2192-degrees F. with a porosity level of less than 1 percent, it blocks moisture absorption, which can lead to cracking, crazing, and rippling along the interior. Its non-porous construction also resists odors, scratching, and staining for hygienic use and optimal performance. Even more, its high-quality enamel protects against metal marks and other damage, which means it's safe to use with knives. Best of all, the glaze on the exterior makes the stoneware items fun to mix and match with other coordinating Le Creuset pieces (sold separately), while a neutral-colored glaze on the inside offers an optimal palette for food presentation. and thanks to an unmatched thermal resistance from-65-degrees F to 500-degrees F, Le Creuset stoneware moves effortlessly from the microwave or oven (or under the broiler) to the table for serving to the refrigerator or freezer for storing leftovers. When finished, it cleans up easily by hand or in the dishwasher.
feature_bullets: Spoon rest made from high-fired stoneware
Non-porous enamel finish; resists odors, staining, chipping, and cracking
Provides ample space for resting spoons, spatulas, and ladles
Spoon rest made from high-fired stoneware
Non-porous enamel finish; resists odors, staining, chipping, and cracking
Provides ample space for resting spoons, spatulas, and ladles
